item.title: Tex on top middle of screen!
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

The Steps
P.S, This is for if you already got the:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@p@red@o@gre@o@cya@n@whi@a@red@g@gre@e@cya@p@whi@k@red@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@mathew", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }
In your Client.Java

Step 1:
Go into Client.java
Search for

500ms

Step 2:
Under that line add this:

writeplayers();

Step 3:
Compile & Run

God of Ikiliki © 2006 - 99324323 , W00tz0r Ltd. lmao

Read full topic

item.description:
@bumbumlongtime wrote:

but now ive got a new server and wont the text still so i copy and
paste the cod… from my other server which is this

[glow=red,2,300]//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@p@red@o@gre@o@cya@n@whi@a@red@g@gre@e@cya@p@whi@k@red@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@mathew", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }[/glow]

i get no errors nothing so i was woundering i think i remember having to ad something else to some boolan
or something can you help plz!!!
